processed_hadiths.english_translation: Ubaidullah ibn Musa and al-Fadl ibn Dukayn narrated to us: Israel narrated to us from Said ibn Masruq, from Abu Wail, he said: We came to al-Rabi' ibn Khuthym in his house. A man said: Indeed, you are going to a man if he tells you, he will not lie to you; if you trust him, he will not betray you. We entered and he said: Praise be to Allah, you did not come to me to commit adultery with me, you did not come to steal with me, you did not come to drink intoxicants with me.
